name: swot.me
description: This MAIN package.json is only used to run general tasks.

scripts.dev:setup: export NODE_ENV=dev; (cd pub && npm install); (cd srv && npm install); (cd test && npm install); (cd dpl && npm install); echo $NODE_ENV;
scripts.dev:outdated: (cd pub/vendor && npm outdated); (cd srv/vendor && npm outdated); (cd test/vendor && npm outdated); (cd dpl/vendor && npm outdated);
scripts.prod:setup: export NODE_ENV=production; (cd pub && npm install); (cd srv && npm install); echo $NODE_ENV;
